com.foreach.across.core.installers

Interface InstallerActionResolver


  • public interface InstallerActionResolver
    Implement to have a callback for resolving installer actions upon bootstrap.

    When an Installer annotated class implements this interface, the resolve(String, InstallerMetaData) method will be called if the pre-determined action is InstallerAction.EXECUTE.

    See Also:
    InstallerSettings

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Optional<InstallerAction> resolve(String moduleName, InstallerMetaData installerMetaData)
      Resolve the action for a particular installer in a module.

    • Method Detail

      • resolve

        Optional<InstallerAction> resolve(String moduleName,
                                  InstallerMetaData installerMetaData)
        Resolve the action for a particular installer in a module.
        Parameters:
        moduleName - Module that is running the installer.
        installerMetaData - Installer metadata.
        Returns:
        Action or empty if it delegates the decision back to the InstallerSettings.
        See Also:
        InstallerSettings
